long_description: The GT Channel 20 in. BMX bike offers a tough design paired with top-notch parts so you can find your flow on trails and jumps. Steel frame, fork, bars and 2-piece cranks deliver strong, stiff performance to meet the demands of hard riding; down tube gusset adds strength at a critical point. Burly 2-piece crankset features a welded drive-side arm for excellent strength and drives a 28-tooth chainring to a 10-tooth cog for fast acceleration. Tektro hand brake offers excellent stopping power; brake hardware and cable guides can be removed for brake-free riding. Specs on the GT Channel 20 in. BMX Bike are subject to change. Closeout.
short_description: The GT Channel 20 in. BMX bike offers a tough design paired with top-notch parts so you can find your flow on trails and jumps.
